version_description:
1.7 is massive rewrite of Texpad to improve workflow, typesetting and collaboration with a new, modernised, UI improves your workflow and makes LaTeX easier to write than ever. Highlighted features below

Typesetter:

- Brand new onboard typesetter fixes many limitations of the 1.6.x typesetter, runs faster and is more configurable
- Cloud typesetter supports everything Texpad OSX does: Biber, Makeindex, KnitR, ConTeXt, … to name just a few
- Brand new bundle manager will keep you up to date with the latest LaTeX packages with minimal downloading

Editor:

- Upgraded syntax highlighter and parsers improve support for LaTeX and Markdown, and add support for RNW, luatex and others
- Greatly improved parsers find the document structure more quickly, more accurately, and configure the typesetter for your document
- Select from a number of editor themes

Misc:

- Regular expression support in global search
- File Provider support
- Vast number of bug and performance fixes

1.7 is massive rewrite of Texpad to improve workflow, typesetting and collaboration with a new, modernised, UI improves your workflow and makes LaTeX easier to write than ever. Highlighted features below

Typesetter:

- Brand new onboard typesetter fixes many limitations of the 1.6.x typesetter, runs faster and is more configurable
- Cloud typesetter supports everything Texpad OSX does: Biber, Makeindex, KnitR, ConTeXt, … to name just a few
- Brand new bundle manager will keep you up to date with the latest LaTeX packages with minimal downloading

Editor:

- Upgraded syntax highlighter and parsers improve support for LaTeX and Markdown, and add support for RNW, luatex and others
- Greatly improved parsers find the document structure more quickly, more accurately, and configure the typesetter for your document
- Select from a number of editor themes

Misc:

- Regular expression support in global search
- File Provider support
- Vast number of bug and performance fixes

Maintenance update

- Switch added to allow you to turn off autotypeset when on battery power to preserve battery life
- Fix for crash when typesetting on 32-bit ios devices
- Fix for crash with pdf viewer on iPhone when exporting and no pdf created
- Fix for close button on pdf viewer in local file browser
- Old bundle (1.6.x) bundles are cleaned out when booting

Maintenance update

- Switch added to allow you to turn off autotypeset when on battery power to preserve battery life
- Fix for crash when typesetting on 32-bit ios devices
- Fix for crash with pdf viewer on iPhone when exporting and no pdf created
- Fix for close button on pdf viewer in local file browser
- Old bundle (1.6.x) bundles are cleaned out when booting

* Image files are no longer selectable from the outline
* Fix for bug with live preview introduced in 1.7.1

* Image files are no longer selectable from the outline
* Fix for bug with live preview introduced in 1.7.1

* Work on accessibility features with the iOS screenreader
* Fix for an issue where File modification dates would not update in the file browser immediately after closing a file
* Fix for an issue where the install/uninstall switch label would not refresh in the bundle manager
* Fix for an issue that could cause slow connections to Texpad Connect
* Fix for issue where the last row was not visible in the PDF viewer's thumbnail mode
* Fix for an issue on the iPhone where a document would not open if closed by jumping to the bundle manager
* Fix for visibility of page divider in PDF viewer as you zoom in and out
* Fix for the file browser so that it returns to precisely the folder you were viewing before you switched away
* Fix for inappropriate hide/show of the top and bottom bars in the PDF viewer
* Fix for an issue that would cause the line numbers to become obscured with more than 999 lines
* Fix for a bug with the live typeset when plugged into a power source
* Fix so that files opened by the document picker are available from the home screen after rebooting the app
* Fix for a bug where the font choice would display incorrectly
* Added further fonts to the font chooser
* A number of fixes for crashes in Texpad

* Work on accessibility features with the iOS screenreader
* Fix for an issue where File modification dates would not update in the file browser immediately after closing a file
* Fix for an issue where the install/uninstall switch label would not refresh in the bundle manager
* Fix for an issue that could cause slow connections to Texpad Connect
* Fix for issue where the last row was not visible in the PDF viewer's thumbnail mode
* Fix for an issue on the iPhone where a document would not open if closed by jumping to the bundle manager
* Fix for visibility of page divider in PDF viewer as you zoom in and out
* Fix for the file browser so that it returns to precisely the folder you were viewing before you switched away
* Fix for inappropriate hide/show of the top and bottom bars in the PDF viewer
* Fix for an issue that would cause the line numbers to become obscured with more than 999 lines
* Fix for a bug with the live typeset when plugged into a power source
* Fix so that files opened by the document picker are available from the home screen after rebooting the app
* Fix for a bug where the font choice would display incorrectly
* Added further fonts to the font chooser
* A number of fixes for crashes in Texpad

* Fix for rare crash when connecting to TPC documents
* Fix for subfiles when opening files via the Document Picker
* Fix for a bug when closing documents with TPC
* Fix for bug where the file browser could get "trapped" in a subfolder

* Fix for rare crash when connecting to TPC documents
* Fix for subfiles when opening files via the Document Picker
* Fix for a bug when closing documents with TPC
* Fix for bug where the file browser could get "trapped" in a subfolder
* Fix for typesetting with cyrillic fonts
* Fix for typesetting with cyrillic fonts

* Fixed bug that could cause crashes whilst typesetting

* Added an "Ignore All" button to the automatic file create dialogue
* Added support for
* \mintinline in the editor
* python package in the editor, and typeset autosense
* problems/12376
* \lstinline in the editor

* Minor fixes for
* parser bug that could cause missing sections (common, but no iOS reports)
* bug with autosense that would ignore the dvipdfm options passed to the hyperref package
* item insert in list environments
* issue with markdown parser that could cause it to miss header commands
* graphicspath command in the case of multiple path components
* \includegraphics autocomplete to allow for graphicspath components
* \photo command opening
* syntax highlighting when mutating the end tag of a begin/end verbatim environment
* syntax highlighting with multiline delimiters in .Rnw files
* dollars in newcommand
* image preview with include graphics commands of the form \includegraphics{../XXX}
* snippets with a carriage return trailing them
* unindent block in the case of mixed spaces and tabs
* position restoration of files when tapping the outline
* include command with multiple subfiles
* indent in markdown typesetting
* undoing snippet insertion
* typeset autosense with the standalone package when used with the convert option (cloud typeset only)
* Rnw file support in certain cases (cloud typeset only)

* Fixed bug that could cause crashes whilst typesetting

* Added an "Ignore All" button to the automatic file create dialogue
* Added support for
* \mintinline in the editor
* python package in the editor, and typeset autosense
* problems/12376
* \lstinline in the editor

* Minor fixes for
* parser bug that could cause missing sections (common, but no iOS reports)
* bug with autosense that would ignore the dvipdfm options passed to the hyperref package
* item insert in list environments
* issue with markdown parser that could cause it to miss header commands
* graphicspath command in the case of multiple path components
* \includegraphics autocomplete to allow for graphicspath components
* \photo command opening
* syntax highlighting when mutating the end tag of a begin/end verbatim environment
* syntax highlighting with multiline delimiters in .Rnw files
* dollars in newcommand
* image preview with include graphics commands of the form \includegraphics{../XXX}
* snippets with a carriage return trailing them
* unindent block in the case of mixed spaces and tabs
* position restoration of files when tapping the outline
* include command with multiple subfiles
* indent in markdown typesetting
* undoing snippet insertion
* typeset autosense with the standalone package when used with the convert option (cloud typeset only)
* Rnw file support in certain cases (cloud typeset only)

This update is focussed on providing a better editing experience across all devices.
It is especially noticeable for those using external keyboards with the new generation of iPad Pros, and iPhone users.
A number of issues that arose with iOS 10 have also been taken care of.

* New UI features
* New Keyboard/Editor for a better editing experience across all devices
* Math symbols dropdown on the toolbar
* Snippets dropdown on the toolbar
* New Keyboard Strip
* Fix for crashes, performance and memory issues that started with iOS 10
* Added further handled latex filetypes, including .ldf and .fd files
* Fixes for
* The create suggestions choice to be preserved across boots
* Typeset autosense not to auto-switch to xelatex just due to an eps file if eps2pdf is around
* Bug where jumping to the line from the error view was one line too far
* Delay when opening the document from organiser
* pdflscape with the pdf viewer
* Connect notifications
* Fix for autosense so that hidden directories work with minted provided the `outputdir=.texpadtmp` option is provided

This update is focussed on providing a better editing experience across all devices.
It is especially noticeable for those using external keyboards with the new generation of iPad Pros, and iPhone users.
A number of issues that arose with iOS 10 have also been taken care of.

* New UI features
* New Keyboard/Editor for a better editing experience across all devices
* Math symbols dropdown on the toolbar
* Snippets dropdown on the toolbar
* New Keyboard Strip
* Fix for crashes, performance and memory issues that started with iOS 10
* Added further handled latex filetypes, including .ldf and .fd files
* Fixes for
* The create suggestions choice to be preserved across boots
* Typeset autosense not to auto-switch to xelatex just due to an eps file if eps2pdf is around
* Bug where jumping to the line from the error view was one line too far
* Delay when opening the document from organiser
* pdflscape with the pdf viewer
* Connect notifications
* Fix for autosense so that hidden directories work with minted provided the `outputdir=.texpadtmp` option is provided
* Fix for typesetting files with non-ascii characters in the cloud
* Fix for typesetting files with non-ascii characters in the cloud
* Fix for crash
* Fix for crash

* New cloud file sync system
* Fixes and improvements for working offline with Dropbox
* Support added for WebDAV, browse your WebDAV server from within Texpad's file browser and work offline
* Added synchronisation system to the internal typesetter. Press and hold to synchronise Editor and PDF
* Fixes for
* Fix for unicode characters in the filenames with cloud typesetter
* Autosense fix for `dad` package
* Fix so that .aux files, etc. don't get downloaded from dropbox on the first run

* New cloud file sync system
* Fixes and improvements for working offline with Dropbox
* Support added for WebDAV, browse your WebDAV server from within Texpad's file browser and work offline
* Added synchronisation system to the internal typesetter. Press and hold to synchronise Editor and PDF
* Fixes for
* Fix for unicode characters in the filenames with cloud typesetter
* Autosense fix for `dad` package
* Fix so that .aux files, etc. don't get downloaded from dropbox on the first run

* Fix for crashes on 32 bit devices
* Fix for crash that could occur when trying to restore File Picker imports on boot
* Fix for input statements that include paths from a parent folder, e.g. `\input{../somefile}`

* Fix for crashes on 32 bit devices
* Fix for crash that could occur when trying to restore File Picker imports on boot
* Fix for input statements that include paths from a parent folder, e.g. `\input{../somefile}`

- Improved logging in the case of errors
- Updates for iOS 11
- Upgrades to internal typesetter, and fixes for
- Nested PGF transforms (affecting beamer, pgfplots, commutative diagrams and others)
- standalone class
- mdframed package
- hyphenation problems
- filemod package
- tufte package
- Bounding box issues when typesetting images
- Fixes for
- Markdown typeset
- Crash when trying to export a pdf that has not been created yet
- Miscellaneous crashes
- Problem with copying files out of the editor archive
- Error with cloud typeset timeout

- Improved logging in the case of errors
- Updates for iOS 11
- Upgrades to internal typesetter, and fixes for
- Nested PGF transforms (affecting beamer, pgfplots, commutative diagrams and others)
- standalone class
- mdframed package
- hyphenation problems
- filemod package
- tufte package
- Bounding box issues when typesetting images
- Fixes for
- Markdown typeset
- Crash when trying to export a pdf that has not been created yet
- Miscellaneous crashes
- Problem with copying files out of the editor archive
- Error with cloud typeset timeout

- iOS 11 update
- Fixes for issues with 32 bit devices
- Problem with Dropbox support where it would show `/` instead of the folder name
- Problem with bundle manager where it would appear not to connect
- Added better error messages when WebDAV is unable to connect

- iOS 11 update
- Fixes for issues with 32 bit devices
- Problem with Dropbox support where it would show `/` instead of the folder name
- Problem with bundle manager where it would appear not to connect
- Added better error messages when WebDAV is unable to connect

- Suppressed the new iOS 11 quotes behaviour by default as curved quotes break LaTeX typesets
- Altered UI to be compatible with iPhone X
- Bugfixes for
- Crash when opening the pdf viewer when no pdf found on disk, and no typeset result had been made
- Exporting of PDFs from the PDF viewer
- Black top bar on iOS 11

- Suppressed the new iOS 11 quotes behaviour by default as curved quotes break LaTeX typesets
- Altered UI to be compatible with iPhone X
- Bugfixes for
- Crash when opening the pdf viewer when no pdf found on disk, and no typeset result had been made
- Exporting of PDFs from the PDF viewer
- Black top bar on iOS 11

- Fix for problem where remote Dropbox changes would not show up automatically after bringing Texpad out of the background after a long period
- Updated the typesetter bundles
- Local typesetter works with spaces in the filename
- Fixes for
- Dropbox emergency dump
- Local typesetter with filemod package
- trim/clip options with `\includegraphics` in local typesetter
- built-in bibtex with windows line endings
- built-in bibtex in the case of a `\bibliography{}` command containing the extension
- misc bugs

- Fix for the Dropbox linking problem

- Full release of version 1.8.0
- Delivers major functionality updates
- Improved local typesetter that addresses support for many more packages than 1.7
- Support for Files app linking to iCloud and other apps supporting Document Picker API
- Improved Texpad Connect workflow
- Various usability improvements
- Various bug fixes
- Various stability improvements

- Full release of version 1.8.0
- Delivers major functionality updates
- Improved local typesetter that addresses support for many more packages than 1.7
- Support for Files app linking to iCloud and other apps supporting Document Picker API
- Improved Texpad Connect workflow
- Various usability improvements
- Various bug fixes
- Various stability improvements

- Fix for
- Crash in Bibliography tool
- Bug in Unicode math autosense
- Misc issues with internal typesetter
- Bug where restarting app would unlink iCloud folder links
- Bug where files appeared temporarily blank when syncing a large amount of offline work to Dropbox
- Indentation in Sidebar Table of contents
- Bug when creating a new blank markdown file via Organiser's + button
- Bug that created spurious copies when opening files from Files app
- Texpad Connect import from Dropbox
- Bug where non-iCloud files would show the wrong pane when starting from the iCloud pane
- Bug with Importing an image via file browser from the camera roll that would place the image in the wrong folder
- Crash when opening symlinks via Files app
- Bug when moving files and folders between TPC and other file storages

Fix for bug with iOS 3rd party edit in place
Fix for bug with iOS 3rd party edit in place

- iOS 13 Compatibility
- Add indexer to TexpadTeX, you can now typeset documents with indices locally rather than in the cloud
- Fixes
- Fix for problem with linking folders in iOS 13
- Fixed crash in file browser
- Performance improvements

- iOS 13 Compatibility
- Add indexer to TexpadTeX, you can now typeset documents with indices locally rather than in the cloud
- Fixes
- Fix for problem with linking folders in iOS 13
- Fixed crash in file browser
- Performance improvements
Misc. bug fixes, especially with interaction with Files app
Misc. bug fixes, especially with interaction with Files app

- Misc. stability improvements
- Fix for broken popover button in iOS 12

- Misc. stability improvements
- Fix for broken popover button in iOS 12

- Numerous stability improvements
- Fixes to glossary and index compilation
- Scroll lock issues fixed
- File opening problem fixed
- Misc. typesetter bug fixes
- Unclassified capacity problem fixed
- Occasional live typeset using 100% CPU
- Minor typesetter bugs fixed in font stack, input stack and save stack
- Added Koma Script's `addsec`, etc. to autocomplete.
- Misc. improvements to TexpadTeX indexer, especially to compiling of glossaries
- Misc. improvements to autosense
- Colourspace issues affecting fixed, especially cyan brought in line with other LaTeX engines and changed from *additive secondary* to *subtractive primary*.
- Selection in PDF viewer improved
- Problem with shared (non-local) files in the cloud typeset fixed

- Fix for the problem with the coordinated file access (accessing files on file servers and USB drives)

- (This is a re-release of 1.8.7 as 1.8.9 that removes support for iOS 11 and iOS 12 and relies on newer features only available in iOS 13 onwards.)
